content:
Lady Nanbyo (The Widow of Suffering) [CE]

Edicts Revel in destruction, make natural disasters worse, allow natural disasters take their due

Anathema Allow a natural disaster to completely destroy a community or leave a group with no survivors

Follower Alignments NE, CE

Devotee Benefits

Divine Ability Strength or Constitution
Divine Font harm
Divine Skill Nature
Favored Weapon warhammer
Domains destruction, fire, plague, water
Cleric Spells 1st: burning hands, 5th: control water, 6th: dragon form
name: Lady Nanbyo
